column2: Vivint Solar, Inc. engages in the provision of residential solar. The company is headquartered in Lehi, Utah and currently employs 2,542 full-time employees. The firm generates electricity by a solar energy system installed at or near customersâ€™ locations. The company offers electricity to residential customers, primarily through direct-to-home sales model. Its product offering includes power purchase agreements (PPA), legal-form leases (Solar Leases) and solar energy system sales (System Sales). The Company, under its product PPAs, charge customers a fee per kilowatt hour based on the amount of electricity the solar energy system is actually provided.
